headline: Citi’s Long-Suffering Shareholders Are Seeing Progress At Last
summary: Investors in Citigroup, the third-largest bank in the U.S., have had a lot to be disappointed in over the years.  Fraser is in the middle of a years-long turnaround strategy that has involved cutting thousands of jobs, simplifying the bank's business model, and installing new leaders.  “This time is different,” Bank of America Global Research analysts led by Ebrahim Poonawala wrote of Citi in a positive report to clients on Wednesday morning.

headline: Trading Desks Rejoice: Wall Street Keeps Benefitting From Tariff Upheaval
summary: Traders—especially stock traders—rejoice.  Investors have learned this earnings season that last quarter’s whiplash led to outsized gains for trading desks up and down Wall Street.  When markets go haywire—as they did when President Donald Trump in early April announced tariffs that threaten to remake global trade relations—clients typically rush to capitalize on big swings while trying to minimize risks to their portfolios.

headline: Citigroup (C) Reports Q2 US$4 Billion Net Income and Completes Share Buyback
summary: Citigroup (C) recently announced impressive earnings for the second quarter of 2025, with net income showing a substantial increase to $4 billion from $3.2 billion year-over-year, bolstered by an ongoing share buyback program. This financial performance aligns with a significant 46% share price increase over the last quarter, suggesting that these developments likely supported positive investor sentiment. While broader market conditions were influenced by geopolitical tensions and mixed...

headline: How to play financials: Large vs. regional banks
summary: Yahoo Finance Executive Editor Brian Sozzi examines how to play the financial sector as Big Banks wrap up their earnings. Argus Research director of financial services research Stephen Biggar, Citizens JMP Securities CEO Mark Lehmann, and Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Brooke DiPalma share their thoughts about the banking space. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid here.
